abstract: atlanta 's best instagrams from the latest round of snow .
article: across the metro wednesday , students home from school and those `` working '' from home braved the sub-freezing cold to enjoy this winter 's second round of snow accumulation . of course , those frolicking in the frosty conditions snapped plenty of photos to share on social media . instagram was filled with scenes of the winter wonderland from the heart of the city to nature trails in far-flung suburbs . happy photographers risked freezing their phones -- like we did -- to capture the perfect picture . from high-rise views to happy pups , here are some of our favorite snow day instagram posts : .
and , while not an instagram image , here 's the twilight-sledding scene in midtown last night : .
